titles: Die martis, 4 April. 1648. Ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliament, that Mr. Greenhil and Mr. Pocock, treasurers of Chirst Church, do out of the nine thousand and one hundred pounds reserved out of the moneys at Goldsmiths-hall for indigent persons,...
